visualizer.userInterface
Class PixelFrame

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Frame
                  javax.swing.JFrame
                      visualizer.userInterface.PixelFrame
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class PixelFrame
extends javax.swing.JFrame

The PixelFrame holds the whole visualization.

Author:
rene

public void init(VisuMain v,
                 prefuse.Display dis,
                 PixelRenderer ren,
                 GlyphTable tab)
Set up the PixelFrame. It will need data from the VisuMain, the Display, PixelRenderer and GlyphTable, so references to these objects have to be delivered.
